desc.en: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部正在尋找愛麗絲的行蹤。藉由乃愛和優香的協助後，調查出愛麗絲已經前往莉央創造的要塞都市「埃裡都」了。在潛入埃裡都之前，寧瑠提出一項作戰方案。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由诺亚和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，尼禄提出一项作战方案。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，宁瑠提出一项作战方案。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，宁瑠提出一项作战方案。

desc.en: The people contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.jp: The people contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.thai: The people contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.ko: The people contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人聯絡了優香等人，優香聽聞愛麗絲被帶走一事大為驚訝。老師向研討會請求幫助，希望能確認愛麗絲的具體所在地。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人联系了优香等人，优香听闻爱丽丝被带走一事大为惊讶。老师向研讨会请求帮助，希望能确认爱丽丝的具体所在地。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人联系了优香等人，优香听闻爱丽丝被带走一事大为惊讶。老师向研讨会请求帮助，希望能确认爱丽丝的具体所在地。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人联系了优香等人，优香听闻爱丽丝被带走一事大为惊讶。老师向研讨会请求帮助，希望能确认爱丽丝的具体所在地。

desc.zh_tw: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.

desc.en: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to the position they were standing.
desc.jp: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to the position they were standing.
desc.thai: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to the position they were standing.
desc.ko: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to the position they were standing.
desc.zh_tw: 不出老師所料，優香和乃愛找到了被刻意隱藏和刪除的財務記錄，就連優香都對此表示驚歎。在恢復並追蹤去向後，優香找到了一個叫做“Eridu”的要塞都市，據稱正是會長所建。優香將座標傳送給眾人，並表示自己所處的立場不好給予更多協助後匆匆離開。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 不出老师所料，优香和诺亚找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连优香都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，优香找到了一个叫做“Eridu”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。优香将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 不出老师所料，优香和乃爱找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连优香都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，优香找到了一个叫做“Eridu”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。优香将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 不出老师所料，优香和乃爱找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连优香都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，优香找到了一个叫做“Eridu”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。优香将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.thai: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.ko: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.zh_tw: 工程部認為都市的建造原料應該是從千年本地發出，因而只要找到前往都市的無人運送車，將他們置換成貨物裝進去即可。老師好奇工程部為何會願意參與此事，詠葉則表示會長帶走愛麗絲的“光之劍”本身已屬越權，某種意義上屬於對工程部宣戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，歌原则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，咏叶则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，咏叶则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。

desc.en: As the infiltration plan settled, the combat and rescue operations were back on the table. Midori and Yuzu described the situation at the time briefly, saying Toki was as fast and agile as a "cheater". Neru put forward a battle plan, rarely, saying that since the main goal was to rescue Aris, then it would be up to them to attract fires, so that the GDD and the Engineering Department can take that opportunity to rescue. Veritas said they would provide communication support on the back.
desc.jp: As the infiltration plan settled, the combat and rescue operations were back on the table. Midori and Yuzu described the situation at the time briefly, saying Toki was as fast and agile as a "cheater". Neru put forward a battle plan, rarely, saying that since the main goal was to rescue Aris, then it would be up to them to attract fires, so that the GDD and the Engineering Department can take that opportunity to rescue. Veritas said they would provide communication support on the back.

Neru put forward a battle plan, rarely, saying that since the main goal was to rescue Aris, then it would be up to them to attract fires, so that the GDD and the Engineering Department can take that opportunity to rescue. Veritas said they would provide communication support on the back.
desc.ko: As the infiltration plan settled, the combat and rescue operations were back on the table. Midori and Yuzu described the situation at the time briefly, saying Toki was as fast and agile as a "cheater". Neru put forward a battle plan, rarely, saying that since the main goal was to rescue Aris, then it would be up to them to attract fires, so that the GDD and the Engineering Department can take that opportunity to rescue. Veritas said they would provide communication support on the back.
desc.zh_tw: 解決了潛入問題，戰鬥和救援行動又重新擺上檯面來。綠和柚子簡單講述了時當時的情況，表示就像“作弊玩家”一樣快和敏捷。寧瑠罕見地提出了作戰計劃，表示既然主要目標就是將愛麗絲救出，那麼由她們去吸引火力，遊戲開發部和工程部趁機救出即可。貝里塔斯則表示會在後方提供通訊支援。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。绿和柚子简单讲述了时当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。尼禄罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将爱丽丝救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，游戏开发部和工程部趁机救出即可。贝里塔斯则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。绿和柚子简单讲述了时当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。宁瑠罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将爱丽丝救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，游戏开发部和工程部趁机救出即可。贝里塔斯则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。绿和柚子简单讲述了时当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。宁瑠罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将爱丽丝救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，游戏开发部和工程部趁机救出即可。贝里塔斯则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。

desc.en: Rio's victory is sealed in front of Himari, but Himari succeeds in escaping with Eimi's help. Meanwhile, cut off from Veritas's support, the Game Development Department find themselves with their backs against the wall until they are dramatically rescued by Chihiro, the vice president of Veritas.
desc.jp: Rio's victory is sealed in front of Himari, but Himari succeeds in escaping with Eimi's help. Meanwhile, cut off from Veritas's support, the Game Development Department find themselves with their backs against the wall until they are dramatically rescued by Chihiro, the vice president of Veritas.
desc.thai: Rio's victory is sealed in front of Himari, but Himari succeeds in escaping with Eimi's help. Meanwhile, cut off from Veritas's support, the Game Development Department find themselves with their backs against the wall until they are dramatically rescued by Chihiro, the vice president of Veritas.
desc.ko: Rio's victory is sealed in front of Himari, but Himari succeeds in escaping with Eimi's help. Meanwhile, cut off from Veritas's support, the Game Development Department find themselves with their backs against the wall until they are dramatically rescued by Chihiro, the vice president of Veritas.
desc.zh_tw: 就在莉央篤定自己能獲勝時，陽葵在英美的協助下成功脫逃了。另一方面，少了貝里塔斯支援的遊戲開發部面臨空前的危機，貝里塔斯的副部長千尋在緊要關頭戲劇性地出現了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在莉央笃定自己能获胜时，日鞠在艾米的协助下成功脱逃了。另一方面，少了贝里塔斯支持的游戏开发部面临空前的危机，贝里塔斯的副部长千寻在紧要关头戏剧性地出现了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在莉央笃定自己能获胜时，阳葵在英美的协助下成功脱逃了。另一方面，少了贝里塔斯支持的游戏开发部面临空前的危机，贝里塔斯的副部长千寻在紧要关头戏剧性地出现了。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在莉央笃定自己能获胜时，阳葵在英美的协助下成功脱逃了。另一方面，少了贝里塔斯支持的游戏开发部面临空前的危机，贝里塔斯的副部长千寻在紧要关头戏剧性地出现了。

desc.en: Neru and Toki were at a deadlock. The GDD was no match of the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: Neru and Toki were at a deadlock. The GDD was no match of the Avant Guard.
desc.thai: Neru and Toki were at a deadlock. The GDD was no match of the Avant Guard.
desc.ko: Neru and Toki were at a deadlock. The GDD was no match of the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠與季陷入僵局，爭執不下。遊戲開發部一行人不敵前衛君。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄与时陷入僵局，争执不下。游戏开发部一行人不敌前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠与季陷入僵局，争执不下。游戏开发部一行人不敌前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 宁瑠与季陷入僵局，争执不下。游戏开发部一行人不敌前卫君。

desc.en: Rio described the current situation. Himari expressed her approval of the cleverness of Rio's plan, said that "maybe you're right", but still disagreed Rio's original intent. Himari said her "never looking back" personality was both an advantage and a disadvantage. Himari asked Rio "whether she had ever talked to other people or not?" Rio was very confused when the prison was attacked.
desc.jp: Rio described the current situation. Himari expressed her approval of the cleverness of Rio's plan, said that "maybe you're right", but still disagreed Rio's original intent. Himari said her "never looking back" personality was both an advantage and a disadvantage. Himari asked Rio "whether she had ever talked to other people or not?" Rio was very confused when the prison was attacked.
desc.thai: Rio described the current situation. Himari expressed her approval of the cleverness of Rio's plan, said that "maybe you're right", but still disagreed Rio's original intent. Himari said her "never looking back" personality was both an advantage and a disadvantage. Himari asked Rio "whether she had ever talked to other people or not?" Rio was very confused when the prison was attacked.
desc.ko: Rio described the current situation. Himari expressed her approval of the cleverness of Rio's plan, said that "maybe you're right", but still disagreed Rio's original intent. Himari said her "never looking back" personality was both an advantage and a disadvantage. Himari asked Rio "whether she had ever talked to other people or not?" Rio was very confused when the prison was attacked.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央向陽葵講述了自己計劃的當前進度。陽葵對莉央計劃的高明表示認可、“或許是對的”，但仍不同意莉央的本來目的。陽葵表示莉央“頭也不回”的特質既是優點也是缺點，並反問莉央“是否有與其他人交談過”。莉央正在迷惑之際，監獄突然遭到攻擊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央向日鞠讲述了自己计划的当前进度。日鞠对莉央计划的高明表示认可、“或许是对的”，但仍不同意莉央的本来目的。日鞠表示莉央“头也不回”的特质既是优点也是缺点，并反问莉央“是否有与其他人交谈过”。莉央正在迷惑之际，监狱突然遭到攻击。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央向阳葵讲述了自己计划的当前进度。阳葵对莉央计划的高明表示认可、“或许是对的”，但仍不同意莉央的本来目的。阳葵表示莉央“头也不回”的特质既是优点也是缺点，并反问莉央“是否有与其他人交谈过”。莉央正在迷惑之际，监狱突然遭到攻击。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央向阳葵讲述了自己计划的当前进度。阳葵对莉央计划的高明表示认可、“或许是对的”，但仍不同意莉央的本来目的。阳葵表示莉央“头也不回”的特质既是优点也是缺点，并反问莉央“是否有与其他人交谈过”。莉央正在迷惑之际，监狱突然遭到攻击。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

hobby.jp: 今日の運勢の確認、オカルト全般
hobby.zh_tw: 確認今天的運勢、所有的神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.thai: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.ko: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Rio was in great shock, wondering who could possibly be out of her consideration. It turned out to be Eimi from Himari's club. Though only to share the pudding with Himari and it had no effect for the others, Himari said that she still trusted her younger members.
desc.jp: Rio was in great shock, wondering who could possibly be out of her consideration. It turned out to be Eimi from Himari's club. Though only to share the pudding with Himari and it had no effect for the others, Himari said that she still trusted her younger members.
desc.thai: Rio was in great shock, wondering who could possibly be out of her consideration. It turned out to be Eimi from Himari's club. Though only to share the pudding with Himari and it had no effect for the others, Himari said that she still trusted her younger members.
desc.ko: Rio was in great shock, wondering who could possibly be out of her consideration. It turned out to be Eimi from Himari's club. Though only to share the pudding with Himari and it had no effect for the others, Himari said that she still trusted her younger members.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央大為震驚，懷疑究竟是誰脫離了她的計算。原來是陽葵社團裡的後輩英美前來救援，雖然理由僅僅是為了和部長共享布丁。英美承認這麼做對其他人意義並不是很大，但陽葵則表示她信任她的後輩們。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央大为震惊，怀疑究竟是谁脱离了她的计算。原来是日鞠社团里的后辈艾米前来救援，虽然理由仅仅是为了和部长共享布丁。艾米承认这么做对其他人意义并不是很大，但日鞠则表示她信任她的后辈们。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央大为震惊，怀疑究竟是谁脱离了她的计算。原来是阳葵社团里的后辈英美前来救援，虽然理由仅仅是为了和部长共享布丁。英美承认这么做对其他人意义并不是很大，但阳葵则表示她信任她的后辈们。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央大为震惊，怀疑究竟是谁脱离了她的计算。原来是阳葵社团里的后辈英美前来救援，虽然理由仅仅是为了和部长共享布丁。英美承认这么做对其他人意义并不是很大，但阳葵则表示她信任她的后辈们。

desc.en: As the Veritas were frustrated by the fact that the communication was cut off unexpectedly and unable to connect, everyone found a screen monitor was doing something.
desc.jp: As the Veritas were frustrated by the fact that the communication was cut off unexpectedly and unable to connect, everyone found a screen monitor was doing something.
desc.thai: As the Veritas were frustrated by the fact that the communication was cut off unexpectedly and unable to connect, everyone found a screen monitor was doing something.
desc.ko: As the Veritas were frustrated by the fact that the communication was cut off unexpectedly and unable to connect, everyone found a screen monitor was doing something.
desc.zh_tw: 就在貝里塔斯因通訊被意外中斷、無論如何都無法連線上，無從下手而抓狂時，所有人卻突然發現螢幕有了動靜。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在贝里塔斯因通讯被意外中断、无论如何都无法连接上，无从下手而抓狂时，所有人却突然发现屏幕有了动静。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在贝里塔斯因通讯被意外中断、无论如何都无法连接上，无从下手而抓狂时，所有人却突然发现屏幕有了动静。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在贝里塔斯因通讯被意外中断、无论如何都无法连接上，无从下手而抓狂时，所有人却突然发现屏幕有了动静。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: While engaging the Avant Guard, the GDD noticed its behaviour was looking strangely sluggish all of a sudden. Then, Chihiro from Veritas recovered the communication.
desc.jp: While engaging the Avant Guard, the GDD noticed its behaviour was looking strangely sluggish all of a sudden. Then, Chihiro from Veritas recovered the communication.
desc.thai: While engaging the Avant Guard, the GDD noticed its behaviour was looking strangely sluggish all of a sudden. Then, Chihiro from Veritas recovered the communication.
desc.ko: While engaging the Avant Guard, the GDD noticed its behaviour was looking strangely sluggish all of a sudden. Then, Chihiro from Veritas recovered the communication.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人正在與前衛君交戰，突然發現前衛君的動作變遲緩了很多。這時，貝里塔斯的千尋接入通訊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人正在与前卫君交战，突然发现前卫君的动作变迟缓了很多。这时，贝里塔斯的千寻接入通讯。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人正在与前卫君交战，突然发现前卫君的动作变迟缓了很多。这时，贝里塔斯的千寻接入通讯。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人正在与前卫君交战，突然发现前卫君的动作变迟缓了很多。这时，贝里塔斯的千寻接入通讯。

desc.en: With Sumire's help, Chihiro secures the Mirror from the contraband storage and succeeds in taking control of Eridu's network, and the Game Development Department seizes this moment to launch a counterattack.
desc.jp: With Sumire's help, Chihiro secures the Mirror from the contraband storage and succeeds in taking control of Eridu's network, and the Game Development Department seizes this moment to launch a counterattack.
desc.thai: With Sumire's help, Chihiro secures the Mirror from the contraband storage and succeeds in taking control of Eridu's network, and the Game Development Department seizes this moment to launch a counterattack.
desc.ko: With Sumire's help, Chihiro secures the Mirror from the contraband storage and succeeds in taking control of Eridu's network, and the Game Development Department seizes this moment to launch a counterattack.
desc.zh_tw: 千尋在堇的協助下，取得了位於扣押品保管所的「鏡子」，成功掌握了埃裡都的網路。遊戲開發部將此當作契機展開了反擊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 千寻在堇的协助下，取得了位于扣押品保管所的「镜子」，成功掌握了埃里都的网络。游戏开发部将此当作契机展开了反击。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 千寻在堇的协助下，取得了位于扣押品保管所的「镜子」，成功掌握了埃里都的网络。游戏开发部将此当作契机展开了反击。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 千寻在堇的协助下，取得了位于扣押品保管所的「镜子」，成功掌握了埃里都的网络。游戏开发部将此当作契机展开了反击。

desc.en: The Game Development Department succeed in defeating the Avant Guard with the help of the Engineering Department, but the aftermath causes the Engineering Department to retire from combat. However, they continue cheering on the Game Development Department's forward charge.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department succeed in defeating the Avant Guard with the help of the Engineering Department, but the aftermath causes the Engineering Department to retire from combat. However, they continue cheering on the Game Development Department's forward charge.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department succeed in defeating the Avant Guard with the help of the Engineering Department, but the aftermath causes the Engineering Department to retire from combat. However, they continue cheering on the Game Development Department's forward charge.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department succeed in defeating the Avant Guard with the help of the Engineering Department, but the aftermath causes the Engineering Department to retire from combat. However, they continue cheering on the Game Development Department's forward charge.
desc.zh_tw: 因為工程師部的活躍表現，遊戲開發部成功擊倒了前衛君。但工程師部也因此必須退場了。遊戲開發部在倒下的工程師部的應援下繼續向前邁進。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为工程师部的活跃表现，游戏开发部成功击倒了前卫君。但工程师部也因此必须退场了。游戏开发部在倒下的工程师部的应援下继续向前迈进。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为工程师部的活跃表现，游戏开发部成功击倒了前卫君。但工程师部也因此必须退场了。游戏开发部在倒下的工程师部的应援下继续向前迈进。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为工程师部的活跃表现，游戏开发部成功击倒了前卫君。但工程师部也因此必须退场了。游戏开发部在倒下的工程师部的应援下继续向前迈进。

desc.en: Chihiro's appearance made everyone very excited. Others at Veritas also connected to the comm. Hare was very curious about how Chihiro did it, and Chihiro said lightly that it was the "Mirror" came in handy. Everyone remembered the confrontation between Yuzu and Neru at that time, and was amazed by the plan. Momoi questioned the means of retrieving it, and Sumire happened to connect to the comm. Despite the successful hacking, the firewall started making the communication unstable. Veritas promised that the communication would not be interrupted, and everyone continued to combat the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: Chihiro's appearance made everyone very excited. Others at Veritas also connected to the comm. Hare was very curious about how Chihiro did it, and Chihiro said lightly that it was the "Mirror" came in handy. Everyone remembered the confrontation between Yuzu and Neru at that time, and was amazed by the plan. Momoi questioned the means of retrieving it, and Sumire happened to connect to the comm. Despite the successful hacking, the firewall started making the communication unstable. Veritas promised that the communication would not be interrupted, and everyone continued to combat the Avant Guard.
desc.thai: Chihiro's appearance made everyone very excited. Others at Veritas also connected to the comm. Hare was very curious about how Chihiro did it, and Chihiro said lightly that it was the "Mirror" came in handy. Everyone remembered the confrontation between Yuzu and Neru at that time, and was amazed by the plan. Momoi questioned the means of retrieving it, and Sumire happened to connect to the comm. Despite the successful hacking, the firewall started making the communication unstable. Veritas promised that the communication would not be interrupted, and everyone continued to combat the Avant Guard.
desc.ko: Chihiro's appearance made everyone very excited. Others at Veritas also connected to the comm. Hare was very curious about how Chihiro did it, and Chihiro said lightly that it was the "Mirror" came in handy. Everyone remembered the confrontation between Yuzu and Neru at that time, and was amazed by the plan. Momoi questioned the means of retrieving it, and Sumire happened to connect to the comm. Despite the successful hacking, the firewall started making the communication unstable. Veritas promised that the communication would not be interrupted, and everyone continued to combat the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_tw: 千尋的出現讓大家振奮無比。貝里塔斯也連上了通訊。晴很好奇千尋是怎麼做到的，而千尋則輕鬆地表示是之前被沒收的“鏡子”派上了用場。眾人想起了當時柚子與寧瑠的交鋒，在場所有人無一不對這一計劃驚歎不已。桃井對如何取得表示疑問，而堇這時正好接入通訊。雖然成功駭入，但防火牆又使得通訊不穩定起來；貝里塔斯保證了通訊不再會被中斷，所有人則繼續迎戰前衛君。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 千寻的出现让大家振奋无比。贝里塔斯也连上了通讯。晴很好奇千寻是怎么做到的，而千寻则轻松地表示是之前被没收的“镜子”派上了用场。众人想起了当时柚子与尼禄的交锋，在场所有人无一不对这一计划惊叹不已。桃井对如何取得表示疑问，而堇这时正好接入通讯。虽然成功骇入，但防火墙又使得通讯不稳定起来；贝里塔斯保证了通讯不再会被中断，所有人则继续迎战前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 千寻的出现让大家振奋无比。贝里塔斯也连上了通讯。晴很好奇千寻是怎么做到的，而千寻则轻松地表示是之前被没收的“镜子”派上了用场。众人想起了当时柚子与宁瑠的交锋，在场所有人无一不对这一计划惊叹不已。桃井对如何取得表示疑问，而堇这时正好接入通讯。虽然成功骇入，但防火墙又使得通讯不稳定起来；贝里塔斯保证了通讯不再会被中断，所有人则继续迎战前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 千寻的出现让大家振奋无比。贝里塔斯也连上了通讯。晴很好奇千寻是怎么做到的，而千寻则轻松地表示是之前被没收的“镜子”派上了用场。众人想起了当时柚子与宁瑠的交锋，在场所有人无一不对这一计划惊叹不已。桃井对如何取得表示疑问，而堇这时正好接入通讯。虽然成功骇入，但防火墙又使得通讯不稳定起来；贝里塔斯保证了通讯不再会被中断，所有人则继续迎战前卫君。

desc.en: The Engineering Department put their "loudspeaker", a device that had been making for a half year and uncountable money, into use, and the result was amazing. Yet the Engineering Department collapsed due to physical limitations. Sensei and GDD continued to move forward under the guidance of Chihiro.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department put their "loudspeaker", a device that had been making for a half year and uncountable money, into use, and the result was amazing. Yet the Engineering Department collapsed due to physical limitations. Sensei and GDD continued to move forward under the guidance of Chihiro.
desc.thai: The Engineering Department put their "loudspeaker", a device that had been making for a half year and uncountable money, into use, and the result was amazing. Yet the Engineering Department collapsed due to physical limitations. Sensei and GDD continued to move forward under the guidance of Chihiro.
desc.ko: The Engineering Department put their "loudspeaker", a device that had been making for a half year and uncountable money, into use, and the result was amazing. Yet the Engineering Department collapsed due to physical limitations. Sensei and GDD continued to move forward under the guidance of Chihiro.
desc.zh_tw: 工程部將自己花了半年和無數資金研發的揚聲器兼炸彈投入了使用，結果效果良好，“響度”極佳。然而工程部此時也因體力不支倒下，只剩下老師與遊戲開發部繼續前進。千尋繼續為眾人帶路。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部将自己花了半年和无数资金研发的扬声器兼炸弹投入了使用，结果效果良好，“响度”极佳。然而工程部此时也因体力不支倒下，只剩下老师与游戏开发部继续前进。千寻继续为众人带路。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 工程部将自己花了半年和无数资金研发的扬声器兼炸弹投入了使用，结果效果良好，“响度”极佳。然而工程部此时也因体力不支倒下，只剩下老师与游戏开发部继续前进。千寻继续为众人带路。
